forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Cloudy, with a high near 51. Northwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 32, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 49, with temperatures falling to around 47 in the afternoon. North wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 33. South wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then isolated snow showers. Partly sunny. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 37 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Closed for the season due to many down trees.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is open today and tomorrow from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. The Green, Red and Purple lifts will be on. The majority of the frontside runs are open. It's spitting rain this morning, but that is forecast to stop soon. Please be aware that following the ice storm there are many down trees, please stay to the open runs only. Pete Kehoe and friends will be playing the Nub's Pub from 1 PM to 4 PM today. Lift tickets are $25 daily for the last weekend. Thanks for a great season and thanks for skiing at Nub's Nob.
